section.title: Get Involved with the Mabuwaya Foundation
section.intro: Join us in protecting the critically endangered Philippine crocodile and preserving its natural habitat. There are many ways you can make a difference!

options.title: Volunteer
options.description: Become a conservation hero! Assist in field research, habitat restoration, and community outreach programs in Northern Luzon.

options.title: Donate
options.description: Your donation helps fund research, education, and protection efforts for the Philippine crocodile. Every peso makes an impact.
